name: Kirk Sawyer
description: Kirk arrived atNight Cityone day, and soon was able to get a home inPacifica. Not long afterward, he began working as a fixer, often visiting theEl Coyote Cojobar inThe Glen. Kirk claimed the drug cartels were in his favor, keeping many under his thumb with this threat looming over them. Around this time, he worked withVand otherMercs, earning himself a reputation in the process. Pepe Najarro—the bartender of El Coyote—fell into his debt after borrowingeddiesfrom him.
